entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
